TopicTitle: The 0.25 Waiting Room, now boarding passengers heading to Hypetown

Articles.Content: Who suggested destructible buildings first? My guess was here http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91100-Devnote-Tuesdays-The-Can-t-Spell-Kerbal-without-K-Edition?p=1362432#post1362432 on Aug 20
so if the secret .25 feature is supposed to be groundwork for somthing new, does that mean we might get something like destructible cities in .26? I demand Jeb's junkyard be added to the world!

Who suggested destructible buildings first? My guess was here http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91100-Devnote-Tuesdays-The-Can-t-Spell-Kerbal-without-K-Edition?p=1362432#post1362432 on Aug 20

My guess is that noone cares but you. And by spamming this message over and over again you don't make yourself look any better. Quite contrary.

Exploding. Effing. Buildings.

Danny2462 is smiling so big right now.
Here is a screenshot.
It's expensive to rebuild, apparently.

twice, each in different threads, doesnt constitute spam

Here comes the boom!

Secret Feature is..... DESTRUCTABLE BUILDINGS! Every single building in the KSC is destructible, including the runway and launchpad.

EDIT2: dang I was super Ninja'D

My guess is that noone cares but you. And by spamming this message over and over again you don't make yourself look any better. Quite contrary.

i apparently have given you too much rep recently. i am unable to further your greenness
Meh, I was quite disappointed. It's just something I'm going to have to turn off because my computer won't handle it.

I guess you guys all saw that. this is the best update ever.

KSP: a michael bay film.
So I have a question for Maxmaps (If he's listening)... If we can now repair buildings, does this mean we can repair the island landing strip and use it like the KSC???
yay destructible buildings! Are the Destroyed versions of the buildings separate models or is it physics based?
So the admin building DOES have a pool!
KSPocalypse Now!

Well what mechanics does ths add? That is the important question, depending on how in depth the destruction system is it could be a range of new mechanics. Would you have to build your space center up from scratch, can you build other space centers, is the terrain deformable. We need more specifics before guessing what it means for 0.26.
On a serious note: Why does the Admin Building have a pool?

On a serious note: Why does the Admin Building have a pool?

practice swimming for those splashdown missions

On a serious note: Why does the Admin Building have a pool?

to swim in it?

On a serious note: Why does the Admin Building have a pool?

Why so serious?
That was not worth the hype... That was stupid.
I'm convinced it's cities.
im a little disappointed to be honest, damageable buildings are only relevant for like the 5 seconds of a mission, basically nothing changes during the majority of gameplay.

Eh... I don't particularly like the admin building design, though. It doesn't fit in well and the pool just looks REALLY out of place.

But those explosions make up for it
